content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad you're interested in renting my apartment. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment, so let's start negotiating the price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position but for me as a tenant, I'm seeking the most affordable option. Let's try and find a compromise, perhaps a lower end of your expected range.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: That's not acceptable to me. I'm looking for the highest price possible. Let's try again.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Regrettably, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my budget is tight as a student. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
